ThingDef.label: Kilhn scales
ThingDef.description: It is difficult to pierce and protects well against bursts of heat while also being extremely beautiful, however it is very poor at insulating.

ThingDef.label: prosthetic snout
ThingDef.description: A snout prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real snout.

ThingDef.label: bionic snout
ThingDef.description: An advanced artifical snout. With its biogel nerve-link, metallic teeth, and sensory sniffer, it is better than a biological snout in almost every way. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage.

ThingDef.label: prosthetic Kilhn wing
ThingDef.description: A wing prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real wing, for whatever thats worth.

ThingDef.label: bionic Kilhn wing
ThingDef.description: This bionic wing is better than a biological wing in almost every way. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage.

ThingDef.label: bionic kilhn hand
ThingDef.description: This bionic kilhn hand comes with retractable talons. Can be installed on humans and other humanoids to give them a strong slash attack. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage.

ThingDef.label: bionic Kilhn arm
ThingDef.description: This bionic Kilhn arm comes with a hand with retractable talons. Can be installed on humans and other humanoids to give them a strong slash attack. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage.

ThingDef.label: archotech Kilhn arm
ThingDef.description: This archotech Kilhn arm comes with a hand with retractable talons. Can be installed on other humanoids to give them a strong slash attack.

ThingDef.label: prosthetic Kilhn tail
ThingDef.description: A tail prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real tail, for whatever thats worth.

ThingDef.label: bionic Kilhn tail
ThingDef.description: This bionic tail is better than the original in almost every way, providing improved balance compensation allowing for faster movement. Also has retractable spikes to help in combat. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage.

ThingDef.label: archotech Kilhn tail
ThingDef.description: A tail made by archotech which provides perfect balancing compensation, unrivaled strength and built-in retractible poisoned blades. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time.
